scripts.verify-client-build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const distDir=path.join(__dirname,'../client/dist');const indexFile=path.join(distDir,'index.html');const assetsDir=path.join(distDir,'assets');if(!fs.existsSync(distDir)||!fs.existsSync(indexFile)||!fs.existsSync(assetsDir)){console.error('React build not found or incomplete. Run build:client first.');process.exit(1);}console.log('React build verified:');console.log('- dist directory:', fs.existsSync(distDir));console.log('- index.html:', fs.existsSync(indexFile));console.log('- assets directory:', fs.existsSync(assetsDir));"
scripts.package: npm run build:client && npm run verify-client-build && electron-builder --dir && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');console.log('Output directory contents:');const outputDir=path.join(__dirname,'release/mac-arm64/FE Infinity.app/Contents/Resources/client/dist');if(fs.existsSync(outputDir)){console.log(fs.readdirSync(outputDir));}else{console.log('Output directory not found:',outputDir);}" && electron-builder
scripts.package:mac: npm run build:client && npm run verify-client-build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.package:win: npm run build:client && npm run verify-client-build && electron-builder --win
scripts.package:linux: npm run build:client && npm run verify-client-build && electron-builder --linux
